initialProofState:

‚ä¢ CategoryTheory.Limits.HasBinaryBiproduct ((HomologicalComplex.eval C c i).obj K) ((HomologicalComplex.eval C c i).obj L)

initialProofState:

Œπ : Type u_2

decl:
instance (i : Œπ) : HasLimit ((pair K L) ‚ãô (eval C c i)) := by
  have e : _ ‚âÖ pair (K.X i) (L.X i) := diagramIsoPair (pair K L ‚ãô eval C c i)
